content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about applying the evaluation criteria for diseases of the heart, including
evaluating heart disease using metabolic equivalents (METs)
impact of non-service-connected (NSC) conditions on the evaluation of METs
aspirin as continuous medication
evaluation of nephritis and cardiovascular disabilities
evaluating arrhythmias
, and
considering co-existing heart conditions and arrhythmia
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
